lead_paragraph: A hospital worker said that the man, Peter A. Kaisen, of Islip, was denied emergency-room service, a claim the hospital disputes.

headline.print_headline: Veteran, 76, Commits Suicide in V.A. Hospital Parking Lot
headline.main: Veteran Kills Himself in Parking Lot of V.A. Hospital on Long Island

snippet: A hospital worker said that the man, Peter A. Kaisen, of Islip, was denied emergency-room service, a claim the hospital disputes....
abstract: Peter A Kaisden, 76-year-old veteran and patient at Northport Veterans Affairs Medical Center, fatally shoots himself in hospital parking lot; Kaisden reportedly was frustrated for being unable to see emergency room physician for mental health troubles.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Northport Veterans Affairs Medical Center (Northport, NY)
